title: Pokemon OR AS
body: Getting one tomorrow, which should i get:O

replies.body:
Why do people buy the Pokemon remakes? 

Super Shiny Yellow. Omega Alpha Blue. Extreme Sophisticated Red.

"Can't wait to see Kanto for the 9,495,392 time in HD!!!1"
alpha saphire, groudon is %%%%, kyogre is like 10 times better. and start treecko instead of being a wimp and picking someone else.

> Primal Groudon's ability is Desolate Land and it blocks Water-type moves and changing the weather. 

**BLOCKS WATER TYPE MOVES.** AKA, STOMPS ON KYOGRE.
